subject: College Athletics
Football (College)
Football
lead_paragraph: Bill Belton ran for a 2-yard touchdown in the fourth overtime to lift Penn State past No. 18 Michigan, 43-40, in what may be the biggest victory in Coach Bill O’Brien’s two seasons.
snippet: Bill Belton ran for a 2-yard touchdown in the fourth overtime to lift Penn State past No. 18 Michigan, 43-40, in what may be the biggest victory in Coach Bill O’Brien’s two seasons.
